summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding a draft search warrant for a second New York residence, indicating ongoing investigation activity in July 2019.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is forwarding a draft search warrant for a second New York residence.

events.title: Draft Search Warrant Email
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends an email with an attached draft search warrant for a second New York residence.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A draft search warrant for a second New York residence was being circulated among prosecutors on July 7, 2019.
The email indicates active investigation and preparation for potential searches related to the Epstein case in mid-2019.
The correspondence shows coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the investigation.
